model.name: Retail Cutomer Details
model.description: Model with Retail Cutomer related data elements

model.name: Corporate Cutomer Details
model.description: Model with Corporate Cutomer related data elements

model.name: CRM Application
model.description: Data exrtract from Company CRM already process by DQ engine.

rule.name: Customer Type
rule.description: Customer type is mandatory attribute with allowed fields 'A' (Active), 'P' (Prospect), 'C' (Closed) as defined in reference file CSTMR_TYPE_2015_01.doc

reason.description: The value is outside of the allowed values.
reason.name: INVALID

reason.description: Input e-mail address has an invalid format or has an unknown TLD.
reason.name: EMAIL_INVALID

reason.description: Input e-mail address contains only a TLD after @ (corresponding to the RFC 2822 standard), however the domain is considered suspicious.
reason.name: EMAIL_AMBIGUOUS_DOMAIN

reason.description: Email address is valid, however, the input value needs to be somewhat cleansed (brackets removed, i.e. <email> -> email ).
reason.name: EMAIL_CLEANSED

rule.name: Phone Validity
rule.description:
Phone number must be valid US or Canadian phone number. Both international (i.e. 001 or +1) prefixes are allowed as well as no prefix. The number must consists of 10 digits, with the first 3 digits being valid area code from a list-of-values. The only additional characters allowed are rounded brackets '(' ')' and dash '-'.
Cases of 7 repeated digits after the area code are considered default values entered either by a user or ETL process.

reason.description: Phone number consists of repeated characters only (i.e. 203 111-1111)
reason.name: DEFAULT

reason.description: Phone number is shorter then 10 digits
reason.name: SHORT

reason.description: Phone number contains more then 10 digits (even after internation prefix separation)
reason.name: LONG

rule.name: Full Name
rule.description: First name is a free form entry, mandatory, field. May be composed of letters (A-Z including French accented characters), apostrophes, hyphens, periods, slashes and spaces. Last name is a free form entry, mandatory, field. May be composed of letters, apostrophes, hyphens, periods, slashes and spaces.

reason.description: Both first name and last name are null.
reason.name: NULL

rule.name: Gender
rule.description: Gender is mandatory attribute with allowed values 'M' and 'F'

reason.description: Gender is outside of allowed list of values ('M','F','unknown').
reason.name: INVALID

rule.name: Legal Name
rule.description: Mandatory, free form text entry. Must contain at least one character or number.

expression.expression: src_legal_name is not null and ( find(@"[a-zA-Z]",src_legal_name) or find(@"[0-9]",src_legal_name) )

reason.description: Legal name does not contain any letter or number
reason.name: SPECIAL_CHARACTERS_ONLY

rule.name: Registration Date
rule.description:
Mandatory for Customers. Optional for Prospects. Cannot be a future date.
The date 1900-01-01 is considered default and introduced by ETL.

expression.expression: src_registration_date is not null and src_registration_date <= today() and src_registration_date is not toDate('1900-01-01','yyyy-MM-dd')

reason.description: Date value is populated with default value 1900-01-01
reason.name: DEFAULT

reason.description: Value is not null and not integer
reason.name: NOT_INTEGER

expression.expression: toInteger(in_input) is not null or in_input is null

reason.description: Value is not null and not integer
reason.name: NOT_INTEGER

rule.name: Permission Flag
rule.description: Mandatory. List of valid values: Y,N

reason.description: Value is outside of valid list-of-values.
reason.name: INVALID

rule.name: Birth Date
rule.description:
Mandatory for Active Customers. Optional for Prospects. Cannot be more than 150 years prior to the current date. Cannot be a future date.
The date 1900-01-01 is considered default and introduced by ETL.

expression.expression: src_birth_date is not null and src_birth_date >= dateAdd(today(),-150,'YEAR') and src_birth_date <= today() and src_birth_date is not toDate('1900-01-01','yyyy-MM-dd')

reason.description: The value is empty (Active Customers only).
reason.name: NULL

reason.description: The Birth date is in the future.
reason.name: IN_FUTURE

reason.description: The Birth date is more then 150 years in the past.
reason.name: IN_PAST

expression.expression: in_column is not null and in_date is not null and in_date <= today() and in_date is not toDate('1900-01-01','yyyy-MM-dd')

rule.name: Has valid work email
rule.description: Customer has at least one valid work email. Applicable on Active Customers only

reason.description: Customer does not have any Work Phone entry.
reason.name: HAS_NO_W_EMAIL

reason.description: All customer's phone calls are invalid.
reason.name: ALL_W_EMAILS_INV

rule.name: Has at least one valid phone number
rule.description:
Party has at least one valid phone number:
Phone number must be valid US or Canadian phone number. Both international (i.e. 001 or +1) prefixes are allowed as well as no prefix. The number must consists of 10 digits, with the first 3 digits being valid area code from a list-of-values. The only additional characters allowed are rounded brackets '(' ')' and dash '-'.
Cases of 7 repeated digits after the area code are considered default values entered either by a user or ETL process.

orderBy.expression: case( phone_rule_result = 'VALID', 0, phone_rule_result = 'NULL', 1, phone_rule_result = 'DEFAULT', 2, phone_rule_result = 'INVALID_CHARS', 3, phone_rule_result = 'SHORT', 4, phone_rule_result = 'INVALID_AREA_CODE', 5, phone_rule_result = 'LONG', 6, 10 )

reason.description: Customer has no associated phone contact.
reason.name: NO_PHONE

reason.description: Phone number consists of repeated characters only (i.e. 203 111-1111)
reason.name: DEFAULT

reason.description: Phone number is shorter then 10 digits
reason.name: SHORT

reason.description: Phone number contains more then 10 digits (even after internation prefix separation)
reason.name: LONG

reason.description: Input e-mail address has an invalid format or has an unknown TLD.
reason.name: EMAIL_INVALID

reason.description: Input e-mail address contains only a TLD after @ (corresponding to the RFC 2822 standard), however the domain is considered suspicious.
reason.name: EMAIL_AMBIGUOUS_DOMAIN

reason.description: Email address is valid, however, the input value needs to be somewhat cleansed (brackets removed, i.e. <email> -> email ).
reason.name: EMAIL_CLEANSED

rule.name: Customer Type
rule.description: Customer type is mandatory attribute with allowed fields 'A' (Active), 'P' (Prospect), 'C' (Closed) as defined in reference file CSTMR_TYPE_2015_01.doc

reason.description: The value is outside of the allowed values.
reason.name: INVALID

rule.name: Gender code
rule.description: Gender code has to be 0 (male) or 1 (female).

rule.name: Full Name
rule.description: Name contains valid first name and last name

rule.name: Phone
rule.description:
Phone number must be valid US or Canadian phone number. Both international (i.e. 001 or +1) prefixes are allowed as well as no prefix. The number must consists of 10 digits, with the first 3 digits being valid area code from a list-of-values. The only additional characters allowed are rounded brackets '(' ')' and dash '-'.
Cases of 7 repeated digits after the area code are considered default values entered either by a user or ETL process.

reason.description: Phone number consists of repeated characters only (i.e. 203 111-1111)
reason.name: DEFAULT

reason.description: Phone number is shorter then 10 digits
reason.name: SHORT

reason.description: Phone number contains more then 10 digits (even after internation prefix separation)
reason.name: LONG
